an occasion when someone leaves a place quickly, usually after committing a crime: make your getaway The two masked men made their getaway in a stolen van.getaway car Two men were waiting outside the bank in a getaway car. See also

an escape, esp. from a dangerous situation: The men made their getaway in a car parked outside the bank.
A getaway is also a place where you go for a vacation: a getaway in the Poconos
